about_the_game:
Madness Music Pack is composed with darkness in mind. Its melodic themes are perfect for boss fights, unsettling encounters and soul-shattering revelations. Composed by JDB Artist, this unique pack is a fantastic addition to your ever-growing music library.

Features:
  • 22 music BGM themes.
  • Mix of battle, character and area themes.
  • m4a, .ogg, .mp3 and .wav formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects.

Track List
  • All For Nothing
  • Ashen Queen
  • Dark Power
  • Echelon
  • Fighting Will
  • Graveyard
  • Her Name is Madness
  • Hounted Mansion
  • Hunters
  • Innocence
  • Ivory And Scarlett
  • Lost
  • Madden Scientist Gone to Hell
  • Old School Run
  • Old School Trap
  • Salvation
  • Tense Atmosphere
  • The Fallen King
  • Twisted Dreams Gone Wild
  • Uneven Fight
  • Unsacred Grounds
  • Waiting

  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor

  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
